column2: You bask in your glory.
column3: Vous vous complaisez dans votre gloire
column4: Sonnt Euch in Eurem Ruhm!

column2: Your steward gathers up your belongings and the peasants cheer as you ride out the gate.

column2: Your Marshal has claimed a province in your name.

column2: I'll be sure to thank him.
column3: Je m'assurerais qu'il soit remercié.
column4: Ich werde ihm meinen Dank zukommen lassen.

column2: At your bidding, the Marshal has instructed for your banners to be brought down and the castle vacated.
column3: A votre service, le Maréchal a ordonné qu'on abaisse vos bannières et que le château soit abandonné.
column4: Auf Eure Anweisungen hat der Marschall die Banner einholen und die Burg verwaisen lassen.
column6: At your bidding, the Marshal has instructed for your banners to be brought down and the castle vacated.

column2: Time to find another ungrateful vassal to give it to.
